main event: An unidentified object was sighted over Muskallonge Lake, Michigan on 7 Aug 63, described as a bright light in the sky.
interesting points: The light was observed to be 2X as bright as a known reference and brighter than any visible star., It was believed to be moving at a speed 10 times that of ECHO., The observation lasted for 13 minutes from an elevation of 70 degrees to 30 degrees., The object faded from view without any sound or exhaust trail., There were additional reports concerning sightings in the same area around the same time.
witness description: A subject who was fishing at the lake.
